movie.title: Your Name
movie.summary: High schoolers Mitsuha and Taki are complete strangers living separate lives. But one night, they suddenly switch places. Mitsuha wakes up in Takiâ€™s body, and he in hers. This bizarre occurrence continues to happen randomly, and the two must adjust their lives around each other.

movie.title: Violet Evergarden: The Movie
movie.summary: As the world moves on from the war and technological advances bring changes to her life, Violet still hopes to see her lost commanding officer again.

movie.title: Wolf Children
movie.summary: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident, a woman must find a way to raise the son and daughter that she had with him. However, their inheritance of their father's traits prove to be a challenge for her.

movie.title: Spirited Away
movie.summary: During her family's move to the suburbs, a young girl becomes trapped in a strange world of spirits and must find her way out while trying to save her parents.

movie.title: Howl's Moving Castle
movie.summary: When an unassuming young woman is cursed by a witch and transformed into an elderly woman, she seeks refuge in a magical, moving castle owned by a reclusive wizard named Howl.

movie.title: My Neighbor Totoro
movie.summary: Two young sisters, Satsuki and Mei, move to the countryside and discover that their new home is surrounded by magical creatures, including the friendly and giant Totoro.

movie.title: The Wind Rises
movie.summary: The story of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II, and his struggles with love and the consequences of war.

movie.title: Princess Mononoke
movie.summary: A young man, Ashitaka, becomes involved in the struggle between the industrial revolution and nature, as he tries to find a cure for a curse placed upon him by a boar demon.

movie.title: Weathering with You
movie.summary: The summer of his high school freshman year, Hodaka runs away from his remote island home to Tokyo, and quickly finds himself pushed to his financial and personal limits. The weather is unusually gloomy and rainy every day, as if taking its cue from his life. After many days of solitude, he finally finds work as a freelance writer for a mysterious occult magazine. Then, one day, Hodaka meets Hina on a busy street corner. This bright and strong-willed girl possesses a strange and wonderful ability: the power to stop the rain and clear the sky.

movie.title: Ghost in the Shell
movie.summary: A cybernetically-enhanced special agent hunts a mysterious hacker known as the Puppet Master in a futuristic, high-tech world.

movie.title: Perfect Blue
movie.summary: A pop idol-turned-actress begins to lose her grip on reality as she is stalked by an obsessed fan and begins to suspect that someone is impersonating her.
